Description: This projects provides a DirectX 9, DirectX 10 and DirectX 11 support for WPF. The assembly contains DXElement - an easy to use WPF-FrameworkElement.
HomeWiki:
SharpDX.WPF
This projects provides a DirectX 9, DirectX 10 and DirectX 11 support for WPF. The assembly contains DXElement - an easy to use WPF-FrameworkElement.

This projects provides a DirectX 9, DirectX 10 and DirectX 11 support for WPF. The assembly contains DXElement - an easy to use WPF- FrameworkElement which provides DirectX rendering on a D3DImage based on SharpDX 2.3.x (see http://sharpdx.org/).

This project is a newer version of the project http://directx4wpf.codeplex.com/ which is discontinued. The main update in this version is the support of SharpDX 2.3.x

3 Samples of the original project are also included. Please read the original README.txt by Lloyd.
